title: Venus reaches superior solar conjunction today: What does it mean and can you see it?
description: A solar conjunction occurs as Venus' orbit carries it into alignment with the sun and Earth.
content: A solar conjunction occurs as Venus' orbit carries it into alignment with the sun and Earth.
